headline: PPG Board of Directors announce quarterly dividend of 68 cents per share
summary: The Board of Directors of PPG today declared a regular quarterly dividend of 68 cents per share, payable March 12 to shareholders of record Feb. 21.Through the ongoing dedication and engagement of...
